<Button variant="primary" size="md">
  Click me

rawContent:
# Button Component

[component]
id = "button"
name = "Button"
description = "Primary action button with variants"
category = "ui"

# Props definition
[[props]]
name = "variant"
type = "enum"
values = ["default", "primary", "secondary", "outline", "ghost", "destructive"]
default = "default"
description = "Visual style variant"

[[props]]
name = "size"
type = "enum"
values = ["sm", "md", "lg"]
default = "md"
description = "Button size"

[[props]]
name = "disabled"
type = "boolean"
default = false
description = "Disabled state"

[[props]]
name = "loading"
type = "boolean"
default = false
description = "Loading state with spinner"

[[props]]
name = "children"
type = "ReactNode"
required = true
description = "Button content"

# Live preview variants
[[variants]]
name = "Default"
props = { variant = "default", children = "Button" }

[[variants]]
name = "Primary"
props = { variant = "primary", children = "Primary" }

[[variants]]
name = "Secondary"
props = { variant = "secondary", children = "Secondary" }

[[variants]]
name = "Outline"
props = { variant = "outline", children = "Outline" }

[[variants]]
name = "Ghost"
props = { variant = "ghost", children = "Ghost" }

[[variants]]
name = "Destructive"
props = { variant = "destructive", children = "Delete" }

[[variants]]
name = "Small"
props = { variant = "default", size = "sm", children = "Small" }

[[variants]]
name = "Large"
props = { variant = "default", size = "lg", children = "Large" }

[[variants]]
name = "Disabled"
props = { variant = "default", disabled = true, children = "Disabled" }

# Usage example
[usage]
code = """
import { Button } from '@prototype/components/ui/Button'

<Button variant="primary" size="md">
  Click me
</Button>
"""
